name: Destiny Hero
author: Snyffus
notes:
Played a pretty standard Masked D-Hero list to get KoG because it is the best deck right now but the new box and Amazoness are gonna shake up the meta so we have to see what happens, maybe one of these decks is better.
Changed some cards during the run, like Trunade and Treacherous and TTTD and Im still not sure what the deck should look like after the release of Spellbooks and tomorrow Amazoness, more testing needs to be done and MCS VIII next week will show what the top decks and the meta are going to be.
